Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers and Houston Astros kick off Major League Baseball's 2024 playoffs with a Tuesday afternoon matchup in the American League Wild Card round.
Both teams will start their aces looking for a Game 1 edge with Detroit's Tarik Skubal (18-4, 2.39 ERA) set to face Houston's Framber Valdez (15-7, 2.91 ERA) in a battle of top left-handers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers clinched the playoffs for the first time since the 2014 season.
The Astros and Tigers are set for a 2:30 p.m. ET start on ABC.
The game is available on FuboTV (free trial), DirecTV Stream (free trial), and Sling TV (low intro rate)
